summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Mechanical Code, adopting by reference the Uniform Mechanical Code 1982 edition, First Printing, together with its standards and appendices and the City of Seattle Supplement to the 1982 Uniform Mechanical Code, repealing Subtitle IV (Chapters 22.400, 22.402, 22.404, 22.406, 22.408, 22.410, 22.412, 22.414, 22.416, and 22.418) of Title 22 of the Seattle Municipal Code and replacing it with a new Subtitle IV contained herein.
